name: Ganja Tycoon
description:
Build your way up from the bottom the easy way, as a Ganja Tycoon. No one wants to sell out of a basement forever. Make money off everything you touch, slowly build up your network and wealth, can you have an influence on the Planet Mary Jay?

As you climb the ranks and raise enough capital you will be able take take on large jobs. From Woodstock to a casual shipment there is always a job to take on to make you money. They say hard work pays well, and in this case jobs pay the best.
